content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 2, Sevilla 0.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 2, Sevilla 0.
Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Daniel Drinkwater.
Attempt missed. Joaquín Correa (Sevilla) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Stevan Jovetic.
Substitution, Leicester City. Daniel Amartey replaces Riyad Mahrez.
Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Riyad Mahrez following a fast break.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Sergio Rico.
Attempt saved. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Marc Albrighton with a cross.
Islam Slimani (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Vitolo (Sevilla).
Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City).
Vicente Iborra (Sevilla) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Sergio Escudero (Sevilla).
Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Daniel Drinkwater.
Vitolo (Sevilla) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Christian Fuchs (Leicester City).
Offside, Leicester City. Daniel Drinkwater tries a through ball, but Islam Slimani is caught offside.
Penalty saved! Steven N'Zonzi (Sevilla) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the centre of the goal.
Kasper Schmeichel (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Penalty Sevilla. Vitolo draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Kasper Schmeichel (Leicester City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Foul by Islam Slimani (Leicester City).
Stevan Jovetic (Sevilla) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card.
Second yellow card to Samir Nasri (Sevilla).
Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Samir Nasri (Sevilla).
Attempt saved. Joaquín Correa (Sevilla) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Vitolo.
Vitolo (Sevilla) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Islam Slimani (Leicester City).
Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Danny Simpson.
Substitution, Sevilla. Joaquín Correa replaces Wissam Ben Yedder.
Attempt missed. Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right.
Islam Slimani (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Vicente Iborra (Sevilla).
Substitution, Leicester City. Islam Slimani replaces Shinji Okazaki.
Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Robert Huth.
Vitolo (Sevilla) is shown the yellow card.
Daniel Drinkwater (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Samir Nasri (Sevilla).
Goal!  Leicester City 2, Sevilla 0. Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt blocked. Shinji Okazaki (Leicester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Christian Fuchs.
Attempt missed. Wissam Ben Yedder (Sevilla) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left.
Sergio Escudero (Sevilla) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Steven N'Zonzi.
Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Robert Huth.
Substitution, Sevilla. Mariano replaces Gabriel Mercado.
Substitution, Sevilla. Stevan Jovetic replaces Pablo Sarabia.
Second Half begins Leicester City 1, Sevilla 0.
First Half ends, Leicester City 1, Sevilla 0.
